researchers.author: gherkincat
researchers.post: Colin, best wishes for an enjoyable day.  As I’m sure you are aware, today is Yoko Ono’s 81st birthday.  As he late husband suggested “Give Peace a Chance” !Regards,GherkinCat
researchers.title: Brief message to Joel Achenbach, Washington Post, re your hijacked posting on pseudoscience and the Turin Shroud
